nodes.text: The Sextuna Mining Corporation was a mining company based on Blaudu Sextus. The company employed the use of semi-sentient, pacifist Octusi servants from neigboring Blaudu Octus. When Freedom Flight convinced the Octusi to revolt against their masters in 44 ABY, Galactic Alliance Chief of State Natasi Daala feared that the uprising would help fuel other such revolts throughout the galaxy, shattering the stability of the government. As such, she sent funds through the Sextuna Mining Corporation to hire Mandalorians to put down the revolt.
